Posts.Content: Hello I was Diagnios with Metastic Breast Cancer almost 3 years ago early Breast Cancer and went to my pelvic back butt area.I take anitrex and provila shot every 3 months I'm in Remission I stop pet scan but go Dr for blood work ever almost yrly now had breast bone biospy when Diagnios I have good days that I feel normal but some I don't tired achy just get tired of hurting but I push my self take vitamins get sunshine almost every day I hope the lord keeps me here on earth to see my 17 son graduated and hopefully go to college and sometimes I feel very alone for no one understands I'm glad I found this site for I need friends especially people that going thru what I am going thru
Posts.Title: diagnoised with stage iv breast cancer metastasized to bones in spine and pelvic
